title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

title: ACTUARIAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Economics and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and Economics plus any other two (2)            relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

title: AGRICULTURAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
A pass at merit level in Agriculture or related subjects provided the SSCE requirements are met.

Advanced level passes in 2 of Biology, Agricultural Science and chemistry.  The SSCE, equivalent requirements must be met.

NCE with at an overall pass at merit level in Agricultural Science as a double major or in combination with relevant subject.

IJMB passes in 2 of Biology, Agricultural Science and Chemistry with the SSCE requirements satisfied

Any other equivalent qualifications  

In addition to the general requirements for graduation at the University, students of Agricultural Education must offer and pass courses totaling 150 credit hours for the five years programme or 120 credit hours in case of four years programme.  They must also complete and receive a pass grade in Teaching Practical and a research project report on a topic approved by the Department.
utme_requirements: Five credit passes in SSCE or equivalent in Biology/ Agricultural Science, chemistry, economics, physics, English language and mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Chemistry, Biology, Agriculture, Physics, Economics, Geography and Mathematics.

title: AGRICULTURAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes or equivalent in Physics and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any from Introduction to Agricultural Science, Materials and Workshop Process and Machining, Tractor Layout Power Unit Under Carriage and Auto Electricity; Transmission System; Implement and Machine; Principles of Crop Husbandry and Land Use, Materials and Workshop Processes; Construction and Maintenance of Agricultural Machines; general Metal Work; General Wood Work and Building/Engineering Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.

title: AGRICULTURE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one from Biology/Botany/Zoology/Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology/Mathematics (Pure & Applied).
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and  any one of Mathematics, Physics, Geography and  Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any one of Physics or Mathematics.

title: AQUACULTURE AND FISHERIES MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
“A” Level Passes in the relevant subjects. ND with a minimum of Upper Credit  plus 5

Credits in WASCE/NECO/GCE “O” Level to be admitted into 200 Level.
utme_requirements:
Credit Passes in 5 WASCE/GCE/NECO

Subjects including English, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/ Agricultural Science, at least a pass in Physics.  The Credit pass in Agric. Science must be backed up by at least a pass in Biology.  Universities may determine the level of Credit pass for admission
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any other Science subject.

title: ARABIC EDUCATION
utme_requirements: In addition to the general University requirements for University admission, candidates who wish to be admitted into the B.A. programme in Arabic and should possess a minimum of  credit pass  in 5  subjects, including Arabic, English, taken at the WASSCE, NECO, GCE  O Level  or their equivalent  at not  more than 2 sittings for UTME candidates. However, tested products of Pre-degree French from a recognized University and who are qualified may be considered.
subjects: Arabic and any two (2) relevant Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: ARABIC STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arabic and any other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Arabic and three (3) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts and/or Social Sciences.

Five (5)SSC credit passes including
English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, one Social Science subject and any other subject

Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes/NCE to include CRS/Religious Studies.

subjects: Two (2) Arts subjects including CRS and any other subject.

title: CHRISTIAN STUDIES EDUCATION
de_requirements:
Any one of the following qualifications is admissible for the four (4) year degree programmes of universities in education:

a)     A pass at merit level in a relevant Diploma Programme (provided the University English requirement has been satisfied).

b)    Two (2) passes in relevant subject areas at advanced level with SC/GCE    ‘O’ Level credit passes in five other subjects at not more than two (2)           sittings or

c)     Three (3) passes in relevant subject areas at advanced level with SC/GCE    ‘O’ Level credit passes in five other subjects in not more than two (2)           sittings.

d)    Passes in two (2) major subjects in relevant areas in the NCE with GCE          ‘O’ Level credit or its equivalent in five (5) other subjects.  A’ Level             subject for those taking courses in Education.

e)     Two (2) passes at the IJMB (interim Joint Matriculation Board)       examination or Cambridge Moderated Schools of Basic Studies Terminal Examinations in International Baccalaureate from a recognized institution       with School Certificate Credits or equivalent in five other subjects (subject to university requirements).

f)     Five passes in C (ii) above with a School Certificate credit or its       equivalent in other subjects. 

g)    The above qualification in C (i) should apply to students in colleges of Education to qualify for admission in the B.Ed degree programme.
utme_requirements: Credit passes in the Senior Secondary School (S.S.S.) Certificate, or its equivalent in relevant subject areas in addition to acceptable pass in the Joint Matriculation Examination, are the qualifications for admission into the five (5) year degree programmes of Universities in education.
subjects: Two (2) Arts subject including Religious studies and one (1) other subject.

title: CHRISTIAN STUDIES EDUCATION
utme_requirements: As in other Education Arts programme.  However, a credit pass in Religious studies at the Senior School Certificate is required in addition to other requirements.
subjects: Two (2) Arts subject including Religious studies and one (1) other subject.

title: EDUCATIONAL MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
Holders of NCE/Diploma will spend four academic years, while all others will spend five academic years full time.        English Language, Mathematics and other Requirements

In all cases the following shall apply:

At least a pass in Mathematics and Credit in English Language in the Senior Secondary School Exam/West African School Certificate or equivalent for entrants into Educational Management.
utme_requirements:
NCE with an overall pass at MERIT level or above, provided the candidate also has at least five credits in GCE or its equivalent and a credit in Mathematics.

Diploma in Education or in any other area provided the candidate also has at least five credits at O’ level including credit in English and in Mathematics at GCE/WAEC/NECO

teachers Grade II certificate with a minimum of five passes at merit level including English Language and Mathematics

General certificate of Education or its equivalent with at least five credits in two sittings including credit in English and Mathematics.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other Social Science/Arts subject.

Printing and Ceramics.

subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any other Science subject.

title: FOOD ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
Direct Entry Admission is to either the 200 Level or 300 Level depending on the qualification of the candidate.

i) For admission into 200 Level, the candidate must satisfy the following requirements:

a)  Obtain Ordinary Level (O’Level) passes at least at credit level in not more than two sittings in at least five subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and either Agricultural Science or Biology.

b) At least two Advanced Level passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

OR

c) National Diploma (ND) with a minimum of Upper Credit (minimum) from a recognized Institution with one year Industrial Attachment Certificate.

ii) For admission to 300 Level, the candidate must satisfy the following requirements:

a) Obtain Ordinary Level (O’ Level) passes at least at credit level in not more than two sittings in at least five subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and either Agricultural Science or Biology.

b) Obtain Higher National Diploma (HND) with a minimum of Upper Credit from a recognized Institution.
utme_requirements:
This category of admission is to 100 Level and to be qualified, the candidate must satisfy the following conditions:

i) Pass in the University Matriculation Examination (UME) conducted by the Joint Admission and Matriculation Board (JAMB) in English Language, Mathematics; Chemistry and Physics.

ii) Obtain Ordinary Level (O’Level) passes at least at credit level at not more than two sittings in at least five subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and either Agricultural Science or Biology.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

title: MEDICINE AND SURGERY
de_requirements:
Candidates who possess very good grades in Physics, Chemistry and Biology (Zoology) at Advanced Level and credits in English Language and Mathematics at Ordinary Level at one sitting will be admitted into the programme at 200 Level.

Candidates with degrees in health- related courses may be admitted with a minimum degree classification of Second-Class Lower may be admitted into 200 Level. Candidates that excel in 100 Level from other related programmes (Anatomy, Physiology, Biochemistry and Dentistry) may be considered for transfer into the programme at 200 Level.
utme_requirements: Senior Secondary Certificate with credit in Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Mathematics and English Language obtained at not more than one sitting.  UTME subjects are English Language, Biology, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: Biology, Physics and Chemistry

subjects: Biology, Chemistry and either Physics or Mathematics.

title: PEACE STUDIES AND CONFLICT RESOLUTION
de_requirements: In addition to the O’level requirements above, candidates for direct entry admissions should possess NCE with at least Merit in 3 relevant subjects, including in Government/History/Social Studies as a major subject; and Diploma (Credit)/OND (Upper Credit)/HND (Lower Credit) in Museum Studies/Tourism & Culture, Mass Communication, Library Studies, Journalism, Public Administration, Law, Islamic Studies, Social Work, Christian Studies, Theatre Arts, International Studies & Diplomacy and related disciplines from a recognized institution. Candidates with IJMB/JUPEB pass in relevant Arts or Social Science subjects will also be considered for admissions.
utme_requirements: In addition to the general University requirements for University admission, candidates who wish to be admitted into the B.Sc. programme in Peace Studies and Conflict Resolution must have scored the cut-off mark, as set by KWASU, in UTME and should possess a minimum of five (5) O’level credit passes, including English Language, Mathematics, Government, and two other Arts or Social Science subjects, at not more than 2 sittings.
subjects: Three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects

title: PERFORMING ARTS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arts, Social Sciences or Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and Arts subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and two (2) other relevant subjects.

title: PHYSICS
de_requirements: NCE/Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject from Further Mathematics and Biology or Agricultural Science.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or Biology.

title: PHYSICS EDUCATION
de_requirements:
A pass at merit level in relevant Diploma programme (provided the SSCE requirements are met).

Advanced level passes in 2 relevant subjects with SSCE requirements

NCE with at least merit pass in 2 relevant subjects or a double major subject with SSCE requirements.

 

IJMB passes in 2 relevant subject with SSCE requirements

Any other equivalent qualifications with SSCE requirements.

Any other equivalent qualifications.
utme_requirements: Five credit passes in SSCE or equivalents in Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics and English Language.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics or Chemistry plus one (1) other subjects.

title: PLANT BIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/Botany/Zoology and Chemistry or Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Government or History plus two (2) other Social Science/Arts subjects.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE & PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Government and one other Social Science subject
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes  including English Language Government or History and at least a pass in Mathematics
subjects: Three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects

title: PUBLIC HEALTH
de_requirements:
(i)              'A' Level passes in any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics

(ii)            ND Upper Credit in Prosthesis and Orthopaedic Technology.

(i)              Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/ Zoology, Chemistry and Physics plus  three (3) other 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and English Language.

(ii)            NRN or its approved equivalent plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes  in English Language and four (4) Science subjects chosen from Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Human Anatomy, Physiology and Hygiene, Health Science, Further Mathematics and General Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics.

title: PUBLIC HEALTH SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i)              'A' Level passes in any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics

(ii)            ND Upper Credit in Prosthesis and Orthopaedic Technology.

(i)              Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/ Zoology, Chemistry and Physics plus  three (3) other 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and English Language.

(ii)            NRN or its approved equivalent plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes  in English Language and four (4) Science subjects chosen from Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Human Anatomy, Physiology and Hygiene, Health Science, Further Mathematics and General Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics.

title: SOCIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Three (3) Social Science or Arts subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in Arts or Social Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) Subjects

title: STATISTICS
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include Mathematics or Statistics.

NCE credit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and at least three (3) subjects from Physics, Statistics, Chemistry, Further Mathematics, Economics and Geography.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics.

title: TAXATION
de_requirements:
Candidates shall in addition to five credit passes in (a) (ii) obtain at least  A’ level pass at GCE  or equivalent examination in relevant subjects or

OND in relevant discipline with at least upper credit grade in addition to the five credit passes as in (a) (ii) above or

NCE in relevant discipline with at least a merit grade in addition to the five credit passes as in (a) (ii) above.

 HND in relevant discipline with at least lower credit in addition to five credit passes as         in (a) (ii) above.

Final Certificate of relevant Professional Bodies in addition to five credit passes as in (a) (ii) above.
utme_requirements:
Admission into the 100level shall be through the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME) conducted annually by the Joint Admission and Matriculation Board (JAMB)

Candidates seeking admission into Kwara State University shall posses a minimum of  five credit passes from GCE / SSCE / NECO (or equivalent) in relevant subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) social science subjects in not more than two sittings.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics, plus any one (1) of Government and Geography.

title: YORUBA
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Yoruba or Literature in English.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Yoruba and English Language.
subjects: Yoruba and two (2) other subjects in Arts or Social Sciences

title: YORUBA EDUCATION
utme_requirements: candidates must have five credit passes at the senior secondary school certificate including English language and literature or Merit in 5 relevant subject at the Teachers Grade II Certificate.
subjects: Yoruba and any two (2) subjects chosen from History, Literature in English, French, Christian Religious Studies, Islamic Studies, Arabic, Geography and Physics.

title: ZOOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE in Biology, Zoology or Botany and one other Science subject
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology and two (2) other Science subject.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
